TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SpellCheck extends System.Object

summary.span: 为文本编辑控件（如 和 ）提供实时拼写检查功能。

span.span: Provides real-time spell-checking functionality to text-editing controls, such as and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要启用拼写检查器，请在文本编辑控件上将 属性设置为 `true`。To enable the spelling checker, set the property to `true` on a text-editing control. 启用此拼写检查器后，将使用红色波浪线为拼写错误的单词加下划线，如下图所示。When this spelling checker is enabled, misspelled words are underlined by using a red wavy line, as shown in the following illustration. 仅当 WPF 提供默认字典时，才支持拼写检查器。Spelling checker is supported only when WPF provides a default dictionary. 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]中，WPF 提供英语、法语、德语和西班牙语的字典。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], WPF provides dictionaries for English, French, German, and Spanish. ![带有拼写-检查的 Textbox](~/add/media/editing-textbox-with-spellchecking.png "具有拼写检查功能的 TextBox")![Textbox with spell-checking](~/add/media/editing-textbox-with-spellchecking.png "Textbox with spell-checking") 若要添加自定义字典，请将词典文件的位置添加到 集合中。To add a custom dictionary, add the location of the lexicon file to the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CustomDictionaries As IList
public: property System::Collections::IList ^ CustomDictionaries { System::Collections::IList ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用于自定义拼写检查的词典文件位置的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of lexicon file locations that are used for custom spell checking.
The collection of lexicon file locations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自定义字典使用词典文件，这些文件是扩展名为 lex 的文本文件。Custom dictionaries use lexicon files, which are text files that have a .lex extension. 词典文件的每一行都包含一个被视为合法拼写的单词。Each line of a lexicon file contains a single word that is accepted as a legitimate spelling. 文件的第一行可以指定字典适用的区域设置标识符（LCID）。The first line of the file can specify a locale identifier (LCID) that the dictionary applies to. 如果未指定区域设置，则字典适用于所有语言。If the locale is not specified, the dictionary applies to all languages. 有关详细信息，请参阅[区域设置 id](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=165561)。For more information, see [Locale IDs](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=165561). 下面的示例演示了英语词典文件的前几行。The following example shows the first few lines of a lexicon file for the English language. ``` #LID 1033 TextBlock TextBox ListBox ``` 若要为 或从 派生的任何类指定一个或多个自定义字典，请通过将文件的 URI 添加到 集合来指定词典文件的位置。To specify one or more custom dictionaries for a or for any class that derives from , specify the location of the lexicon file by adding the URI for the file to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 使用 向 集合添加文件将导致异常。Using to add a file to the collection causes an exception. 请改用 和 来更新集合。Instead, use and to update the collection. 在应用程序中，可以将字典文件作为内容文件包括在本地计算机上，也可以将其作为资源文件（编译到本地引用的程序集）中。The lexicon files can be included in the application as content files installed on the local computer or as resource files compiled into a local referenced assembly. 可以通过使用包 Uri 来引用该文件。You can reference the file by using pack URIs. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [WPF 中的 Pack URI](/dotnet/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf)。For more information, see [Pack URIs in WPF](/dotnet/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf). 若要启用拼写检查器，请在 上或从 派生的任何类上将 属性设置为 `true`。To enable the spelling checker, set the property to `true` on a or on any class that derives from . 除了默认的拼写检查器外，还使用了该 的所有自定义词典。All custom dictionaries for that are used in addition to the default spelling checker. 有关拼写检查器的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about the spelling checker, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将两个自定义字典添加到 。The following example shows how to add two custom dictionaries to a . 第一个自定义字典（customwords. lex）是在 XAML 中添加的。The first custom dictionary (customwords.lex) is added in XAML. 该文件作为内容文件包含在应用程序中，并复制到输出目录。The file is included in the application as a content file and copied to the output directory. 若要使用 元素，则必须包含系统命名空间。To use the element, you have to include the System namespace. `xmlns:sys="clr-namespace:System;assembly=System"` 第二个自定义字典（customwords2. lex）添加在 事件处理程序中。The second custom dictionary (customwords2.lex) is added in the event handler. 此文件包含为资源文件并编译到名为 WPFCustomDictionary 的应用程序程序集中。The file is included as a resource file and compiled into the application assembly that is named WPFCustomDictionary. [!code-xaml[WpfCustomDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/wpfcustomdictionary/cs/window1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[WpfCustomDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/wpfcustomdictionary/cs/window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WpfCustomDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/wpfcustomdictionary/vb/mainwindow.xaml.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取词典文件位置的集合，这些词典文件用于指定的文本编辑控件上的自定义拼写检查器。

span.span: Gets the collection of lexicon file locations that are used for custom spelling checkers on a specified text-editing control.
The collection of lexicon file locations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自定义字典使用词典文件，这些文件是扩展名为 lex 的简单文本文件。Custom dictionaries use lexicon files, which are simple text files that have a .lex extension. 词典文件的每一行都包含一个被视为合法拼写的单词。Each line of a lexicon file contains a single word that is accepted as a legitimate spelling. 文件的第一行可以指定字典适用的区域设置标识符（LCID）。The first line of the file can specify a locale identifier (LCID) that the dictionary applies to. 如果未指定区域设置，则字典适用于所有语言。If the locale is not specified, the dictionary applies to all languages. 有关详细信息，请参阅[区域设置 id](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=165561)。For more information, see [Locale IDs](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=165561). 下面的示例演示了英语词典文件的前几行。The following example shows the first few lines of a lexicon file for the English language. ``` #LID 1033 TextBlock TextBox ListBox ``` 若要为 或从 派生的任何类指定一个或多个自定义字典，请通过将文件的 URI 添加到 方法返回的 来指定词典文件的位置。To specify one or more custom dictionaries for a or any class that derives from , specify the location of the lexicon file by adding the URI for the file to the returned by the method. 若要启用拼写检查器，请在 上或从 派生的任何类上将 属性设置为 `true`。To enable the spelling checker, set the property to `true` on a or on any class that derives from . 除了默认的拼写检查器外，还使用了该 的所有自定义词典。All custom dictionaries for that are used in addition to the default spelling checker. 有关拼写检查器的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about the spelling checker, see .

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the spelling checker is enabled on the specified text-editing control.

returns.span: 如果对该文本编辑控件启用拼写检查器，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the spelling checker is enabled on the text-editing control; otherwise, .
The is .

member this.IsEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是否对此文本编辑控件（如 或 ）启用拼写检查器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the spelling checker is enabled on this text-editing control, such as or .

value.span: 如果对控件启用拼写检查器，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the spelling checker is enabled on the control; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此依赖属性还具有专用的只写附加属性用法。This dependency property also has a specialized write-only attached property usage. 用于设置属性的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]*语法 `<`* **IsEnabled**`="`*boolValue*`" .../>`，其中*textBoxBaseClass*是从 派生的类的对象元素， *boolValue*是 `true` 或 `false` （不区分大小写）。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax for setting the property is `<`*textBoxBaseClass* **SpellCheck.IsEnabled**`="`*boolValue*`" .../>`, where *textBoxBaseClass* is an object element for a class that derives from , and *boolValue* is either `true` or `false` (case insensitive). 若要将属性设置为代码中的附加属性，请参阅 方法。To set the property as an attached property in code, see the method. 没有匹配的 `GetIsEnabled` 访问器。There is no matching `GetIsEnabled` accessor. 若要获取该值，请从 属性获取当前 对象，然后从该 获取 属性的值。To get the value, get the current object from the property, and then get the value of the property from that . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

span.span: Enables or disables the spelling checker on the specified text-editing control, such as or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法启用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]中的 属性的附加属性用法。This method enables an attached property usage for the property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 下面的示例演示了 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 用法。The following example shows the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetSpellingReform (System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase textBoxBase, System.Windows.Controls.SpellingReform value);
.method public static hidebysig void SetSpellingReform(class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase textBoxBase, valuetype System.Windows.Controls.SpellingReform value) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SetSpellingReform (textBoxBase As TextBoxBase, value As SpellingReform)
public: static void SetSpellingReform(System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::TextBoxBase ^ textBoxBase, System::Windows::Controls::SpellingReform value);

param.name: textBoxBase
param.span: 应用拼写检查器的文本编辑控件。

span.span: The text-editing control to which the spelling checker is applied.
Example controls include and .

param.name: value
param.span: 确定拼写改革规则的 值。

span.span: The value that determines the spelling reform rules.

summary.span: 确定拼写检查器使用的拼写改革规则。

span.span: Determines the spelling reform rules that are used by the spelling checker.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法访问的拼写改革规则指的是1990的法语和德语拼写抽取。The spelling reform rules that are accessed by this method refer to the French and German spelling reforms of the 1990's. 此方法在与任何其他语言一起使用时不起作用。This method has no effect when it is used with any other language. 此方法启用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]中的 属性的附加属性用法。This method enables an attached property usage for the property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::SpellingReform SpellingReform { System::Windows::Controls::SpellingReform get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::SpellingReform value); };
member this.SpellingReform : System.Windows.Controls.SpellingReform with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由拼写检查器使用的拼写修订规则。

span.span: Gets or sets the spelling reform rules that are used by the spelling checker.

value.span: 由拼写检查器使用的拼写修订规则。

span.span: The spelling reform rules that are used by the spelling checker.

value.span: 默认值对于法语是 ，对于德语是 。

span.span: The default value is for French and for German.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定的拼写改革规则是指法语和德语拼写抽取。The spelling reform rules that are determined by this property refer to the French and German spelling reforms. 此属性与任何其他语言一起使用时不起作用。This property has no effect when it is used with any other language. 此依赖属性还具有专用的只写附加属性用法。This dependency property also has a specialized write-only attached property usage. 用于设置属性的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]*语法 `<`* **SpellingReform**`="`*属于 enumvalue*`" .../>`，其中*textBoxBaseClass*是从 派生的类的对象元素，*属于 enumvalue*是 枚举的值的字符串名称。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax for setting the property is `<`*textBoxBaseClass* **SpellCheck.SpellingReform**`="`*enumValue*`" .../>`, where *textBoxBaseClass* is an object element for a class that derives from , and *enumValue* is a string name for a value of the enumeration. 若要将属性设置为代码中的附加属性，请参阅 方法。To set the property as an attached property in code, see the method. 没有匹配的 `GetSpellingReform` 访问器。There is no matching `GetSpellingReform` accessor. 若要获取该值，请从 属性获取当前 对象，然后从该 获取 属性的值。To get the value, get the current object from the property, and then get the value of the property from that . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
